3.1.0.en:
ğŸš€ Major Update: Node.js Tools + Advanced Systems
âœ… PowerShellâ†’Node.js multiplatform tools
âœ… HealthCheck system for device diagnostics
âœ… Enhanced Tuya DP Engine
âœ… FallbackSystem with intelligent retry

âœ… Fixed IAS Zone enrollment

3.1.5.en:
ğŸ›¡ï¸ PREVENTIVE FIX: IAS Zone enrollment improvements from v2.15.71 working pattern
âœ… IEEE Buffer conversion with reversed byte order (CRITICAL for enrollment)
âœ… Enrollment verification with readAttributes
âœ… 2-second delay for enrollment completion
âœ… Applied to motion sensor and SOS button drivers
âœ… Proactive fix based on forensic analysis of working v2.x versions
ğŸ“Š Should resolve remaining Peter diagnostic issues

3.1.9.en:
ğŸ”§ CRITICAL FIXES + MASSIVE IMPROVEMENTS
âœ… Fixed diagnostic ef9db7d4: Motion sensor & SOS button battery/readings
âœ… ALL cluster IDs converted to numeric format (126 fixes across 106 drivers)
âœ… Custom clusters support: Tuya (0xEF00), Xiaomi (0xFCC0), Philips, IKEA
âœ… Fixed IEEE address retrieval (SDK3 compatible: this.zclNode.ieeeAddress)
âœ… GitHub Actions: Using official Athom actions (not CLI)
âœ… README.txt added for App Store compliance
âœ… App description updated: 190 drivers, 12,563+ manufacturer IDs
âœ… 25+ brands support, 96%+ Zigbee market coverage
ğŸ“Š Result: No more 'expected_cluster_id_number' errors!
